message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you say?
I'll take 80, you get 20. It's a better deal than last time!
Let's split it evenly this time.  Inflation is hitting us both, so a 50/50 split seems fairest.  What do you think?
You're getting low, I'm getting high. Take 15, I'll take 85. It's the best you'll get!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's go with a 30/70 split.  Inflation's been rough, but I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
